mutants.code:
def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(1, n + 1))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total != required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(2, n + 1))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(0, n + 1))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(0, n + 1))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(-1, n + 1))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(1, n - 1))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(1, n * 1))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(1, n + 2))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(1, n + 0))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(1, n + 0))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total

def can_redistribute_goodies(arr, n):
    required_total = sum(range(1, n + -1))
    current_total = sum(arr)
    return current_total == required_total
